documentation.introduction: Slide attack on Feistel cipher is a cryptographic attack where a slid pair is used along with the known round function to extract the unknown key.
documentation.usage: The plugin for Slide attack on Feistel takes two inputs; the plain text and corresponding cipher text which together are called slid pair if they are one round encrypted. The slid pair can be any alphanumeric character (within ASCII range). When the plugin is run with proper inputs, it generates the unknown key as output.
